Invocation for when tragedy strikes.ARABIC_TEXT: ((إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ أْجُرْنِي فِي مُصِيبَتِي، وَأَخْلِفْ لِي خَيْرَاً مِنْهَا)).
Invocation for when tragedy strikes.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Inna lillahi wa-inna ilayhi rajiAAoon, allahumma/- jurnee fee museebatee wakhluf lee khayran minha.)
Invocation for when tragedy strikes.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (To Allah we belong and unto Him is our return.O Allah, recompense me for my affliction and replace it for me with something better.)
